input_text:
Job Title: Archer GRC Developer | Configuration Admin - 100% REMOTE

Location: Owings Mills, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Top Skills 

 Sr Archer GRC Developer/Configuration Admin with 5+ years of professional experience with Archer GRC Platform. Expertise working with core components of Archer Development specifically working with data feeds and has an understanding of how Archer API's interact. Expertise in developing ODAs and core solutions customization. Experience in installing Packages for production deployments.


 Description 

Archer GRC Developer

Location: Remote Position.

 About The Role 

Technology Team is looking for an Archer GRC Developer to join their team! This team is managing and creating a governance risk and compliance solution for multiple business lines. This candidate will play a pivotal role in new development, enhancements, management, and administration of their Archer GRC Platform. This is an excellent opportunity to get your foot in the door of one of the most successful asset management companies globally. In addition this is a long term initiative with potential to convert full time if there is mutual interest.

 Responsibilities 

 5 + years of experience in Archer GRC platform. Expertise in developing ODAs and core solutions customization. Experience in installing Packages for production deployments. Experience working with core components of Archer development such as Access Management (i.e., Role/Groups/Record Permissions), Forms/sub forms/Applications/questionnaires, Fields/Layouts, Data Driven Events, Advanced Workflow, Data Feeds, APIs, Notifications, Calculated Fields, Cross reference, Mail Merge, Data Imports, iViews, Dashboards, Reports, Value Lists etc. Partnering with vendor support on troubleshooting, upgrades and maintenance activities. Demonstrates strong logic and reasoning capabilities. Ability to collaborate with rest of the team and addressing Archer specific solutions in the team. You identify system/process/data impacts (upstream and downstream) and propose appropriate alternatives or remediation options, highlighting trade-offs when necessary. Extensive experience interfacing with clients and stakeholders. Working knowledge of agile best practices. Excellent verbal and written communication skills and ability to communicate with non-technical audiences. Archer API knowledge is a plus. Prior experience in the Financial Services and Asset Management industries is a Plus.


 Skills 

api, Archer, Archer grc, configuration, configuration administration, spring, springboot, microservices

 Qualifications 

 Additional Skills & Qualifications: 

 Bachelor's degree in a technical field such as computer science, computer engineering or related field required 8-10 years experience required A solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design large systems software design and development experience Experience performing in-depth troubleshooting and unit testing with both new and legacy production systems experience in programming and experience with problem diagnosis and resolution


 Experience Level 

Expert Level

 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
